pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/rider_core_ids#punkjack_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Punkjack Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Punkjack
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_punkjack)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost

pages.name: Monster Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#monster_raise_buckle)Monster Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Punkjack
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_punkjack)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost$(br2)Monster Buckle Effects:$(li)Punch V$(li)Strength VIII (with empty hand)$(li)Resistance II

pages.name: Armed Shield
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#shield_raise_buckle)Shield Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Punkjack
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_punkjack)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost$(br2)Shield Buckle Effects:$(li)Resistance

pages.name: NinjaMonster Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#fever_slot_raise_buckle)Feverslot Buckle$(/l) in your main hand and the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#monster_raise_buckle)Monster Buckle$(/l) in your off-hand

pages.title: Kamen Rider Punkjack
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_punkjack)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost$(br2)Ninja Buckle Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost V$(br2)Monster Buckle Effects:$(li)Punch V$(li)Strength VIII (with empty hand)$(li)Resistance II

pages.name: Fever Monster Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#fever_slot_raise_buckle)Feverslot Buckle$(/l) in your main hand and the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#monster_raise_buckle)Monster Buckle$(/l) in your off-hand

pages.title: Kamen Rider Punkjack
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_punkjack)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost$(br2)Monster Form Effects:$(li)Punch VII$(li)Strength X (with empty hand)$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Jump Boost III

pages.name: Beat Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#beat_raise_buckle)Beat Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Punkjack
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Geats Extra: Kamen Rider PunkJack (2023, TTFC special)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_punkjack)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost$(br2)Beat Buckle Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost II

pages.name: Armed Chain Array
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#chain_array_raise_buckle)Chain Array Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Punkjack
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Detail of Heroes Kamen Rider Geats: Sosei (2024, photo book)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_punkjack)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost$(br2)Chain Array Buckle Effects:$(li)Slash II$(li)Strength II (with sword)$(li)Mining Fatigue
